trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the encryption algorithm used for XML encryption.
The `<EncryptionMethod>` tag uses a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to identify the encryption algorithm that must be used to decrypt XML data.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class encapsulates the `<EncryptionMethod>` tag defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class to identify the encryption algorithm associated with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> class.
This constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class without specifying the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of an encryption algorithm.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> class specifying an algorithm Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
This constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class using the URI of an encryption algorithm.
Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
Returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that encapsulates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.GetXml%2A> method returns a representation of the `<EncryptionMethod>` element.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that encapsulates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the algorithm to use for XML encryption.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeyAlgorithm%2A> property describes the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the encryption algorithm used to encrypt data associated with either the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the algorithm to use for XML encryption.
Gets or sets the algorithm key size used for XML encryption.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeySize%2A> property describes the key size of the encryption algorithm used to encrypt data associated with either the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
The algorithm key size, in bits, used for XML encryption.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeySize"></xref> property was set to a value that was less than 0.
Parses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod"></xref> object to match.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.LoadXml%2A> method configures the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> object to match the state of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object to parse.
The value parameter is `null`.
The key size expressed in the value parameter was less than 0.
